scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn setup:frontend && yarn setup:backend
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && yarn start" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.dev: yarn clear && concurrently "cd frontend && yarn dev" "cd backend && yarn develop"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
